mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_WRITER, QNA_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(QNA_INSERTDATE, INTERVAL 9 HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d') AS QNA_INSERTDATE, QNA_COMMENT FROM QNA_LIST ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_LIST ( QNA_WRITER, QNA_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{qna_writer}, #{qna_content} )
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA_LIST SET QNA_COMMENT = NULL WHERE QNA_NO = #{qna_no }
